specification.description: A trustline specification that would produce this trustline in its current state.

limit.description: The maximum amount that the counterparty can be owed through the trustline.

ripplingDisabled.description: If true, payments cannot ripple through this trustline.

frozen.description: If true, the trustline is frozen, which means that funds can only be sent to the counterparty.

authorized.description: If true, the counterparty authorizes this party to hold issuances from the counterparty.

counterparty.description: Properties of the trustline from the perspective of the counterparty.

balance.description: The balance on the trustline, representing which party owes the other and by how much.

state.description: Properties of the trustline regarding it's current state that are not part of the specification.
